description:
In Cloudberry Kingdom, the beloved platformer returns, now available on modern consoles with improved resolution. Dive into a world where every jump, jetpack boost, and wheelie roll feels new, yet comfortingly familiar.

Meet Bob, the courageous hero of Cloudberry Kingdom. When the nefarious King Kobbler threatens to plunge the kingdom into chaos, Bob must rise to the challenge. With the princess in peril and the kingdom's future at stake, Bob sets off on an epic quest to save the day.

Key Features:

Experience endless platforming challenges with procedurally generated levels that are never the same twice.
Follow Bob's epic quest to save the kingdom in Story Mode, facing off against King Kobbler’s minions and overcoming insurmountable odds.
Customize your own levels and challenge friends to beat your creations in Free Play Mode.
Test your skills in a variety of mini-games and time trials designed to push your platforming abilities to the limit in Arcade Mode.
Join forces with friends in cooperative play or compete against each other in thrilling multiplayer challenges.
Personalize Bob with a variety of costumes and accessories to your liking.

Cloudberry Kingdom promises to deliver the same heart-pounding platforming action that fans loved, now with enhanced resolution for a modern gaming experience. Get ready to jump back into the action and save Cloudberry Kingdom!
